scenario: In 2025, Bob has wages of $85,698.59. Bob also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $36,452.10 for the year. Bob has passive income from another source of $22,104.40.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2025 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. Deductible: $22,104.40.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
